answerText: Naomi Klein[10] One of the companies targeted in Klein's previous book, No Logo, was this clothing manufacturer named after the winged Greek goddess of victory.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 7 | 15 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Along with her husband, Avi Lewis, this woman made a documentary about a group of Argentine workers who run an automobile plant as a collective. For 10 points each: [10] Name this woman behind The Take who may be better known for explaining how right-wing economic policies are implemented in times of social strife in her book The Shock Doctrine: The Rise of Disaster Capitalism.
